name: The Grapefruit Julep Cocktail
description: Gin, grapefruit juice, sugar syrup, and mint leaves. A twist on the classic cocktail for a more refreshing taste.

instruction.Prepare: Cut your grapefruit for squeezing and garnish and pick your mint leaves and sprig

instruction.Add Ingredients: Clap the mint leaves in your hand to wake up the flavors and put them in the bottom of your mixing glass. Add the rest of the ingredients

instruction.Crushed Ice: Fill your glass 3/4 full with crushed ice

instruction.Stir: Using your bar spoon, stir all the ingredients together really well

instruction.More Ice: Fill up your glass with more crushed ice

instruction.Garnish and serve: Garnish with your grapefruit slice and fresh mint sprig and serve.

name: The Dark and Stormy Cocktail
description: Created by Gosling's Black Seal rum on the Caribbean island of Bermuda, where they mixed it with fiery Ginger Beer and fresh lime, creating a classic enjoyed WorldWide (especially during Halloween)

instruction.Prepare: Cut your lime wedges ready for garnish

instruction.Ice: Fill your highball glass with ice

instruction.Add ingredients: Pour your rum and ginger beer over the ice

instruction.Squeeze lime: Squeeze in both the limes and drop them into your drink

instruction.Stir and serve: Using your barspoon, stir all the ingredients together well

name: The White Ukrainian Cocktail
description: Yes, we changed the title. To raise awareness that we all are standing with the Ukrainian people at these times. Please make this drink and enjoy the taste, but also remember to send your best thoughts to Ukraine.

instruction.Ice: Fill your rocks glass with cubed ice

instruction.Add ingredients: Pour in your vodka and coffee liquor

instruction.Stir: Stir the ingredients together with your bar spoon

instruction.More ice: Add a couple more cubes of ice

instruction.Cream: Slowly pour your cream on the ice for a layered effect

name: The Nuclear Daiquiri Cocktail
description: Created by Gregor de Gruyther in 2005 in London, this twisted overproof Daiquiri is really quite hard hitting with strong herbal overtones.

instruction.Prepare: Cut your lime wedge ready for garnish and juicing

instruction.Ice: Fill both your shaker and martini glass with cubed ice

instruction.Add ingredients: Pour all 4 ingredients into your shaker

instruction.Shake: Close the shaker and shake hard for 7 seconds

instruction.Empty and Strain: Empty the ice in your martini glass back into the ice bucket. Take off the small top off the shaker and strain out the mix into your chilled glass.

instruction.Garnish and serve: Garnish with your fresh lime wedge
